attributes.action: Non school uniform should be every Friday in  UK schools
attributes.additional_details: Because many children are uncomfortable in their uniform it gives us limits of what we can and can’t do
attributes.background: Let children in the UK wear what they want on Fridays

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about when to schedule days that school uniforms don't apply are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ban school uniforms in English schools: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607158

Require schools to make uniform optional: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608259
